document_data.name: Zorath Blackblade
document_data.mainbody: '''Zorath Blackblade''' was an assassin working for the slaver ring that had taken over the Sandvoyagers' Guild in {{yearlink|1356}}, at the time of the release of the efreet Khalitarius.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|65}}
document_data.Abilities: Zorath's strength and dexterity were optimal. However, only his climbing skill was good.
document_data.Activities:
The assassin was under contract with Thurnas Netmaster.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|72}}  though he also wandered the oasis sometimes.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|67}}

He was also known to [[Tekuna Chand]], who'd caution people not to trust him.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|14}}
